```{python}
#| label: setup

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import sys
from pathlib import Path
from IPython.display import Markdown, display

def find_manuscript_root(start: Path) -> Path:
    for parent in [start] + list(start.parents):
        if (parent / "_quarto.yml").exists() and (parent / "code" / "_common.py").exists():
            return parent
    raise FileNotFoundError("Could not locate manuscript root from current working directory.")

MANUSCRIPT_ROOT = find_manuscript_root(Path.cwd())
sys.path.insert(0, str(MANUSCRIPT_ROOT / "code"))
from _common import (
    load_diagnostic, show_table, format_pvalue, format_ci,
    add_significance_stars, data_available, DATA_DIR, FIG_DIR
)

# Check if pipeline data is available
PIPELINE_DATA_READY = data_available()
if not PIPELINE_DATA_READY:
    print("Note: Pipeline data not yet available. Run the pipeline to generate results.")
```
